Package at.qe.timeguess.services

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationService
    Class that provides all methods needed for creating and validating JWT tokens.
    CategoryService
    This class represents the Service with which Categories get managed.
    ExpressionService
    This class represents the Service with which Expressions get managed.
    LobbyService
    Class that holds and manages all games.
    RandomCodeService
    Service to generate random Strings (strongly inspired by https://mkyong.com/java/java-how-to-generate-a-random-string/)
    RaspberryService  
    StatisticsService
    Class that manges the persisting of completed Games and retrieving Statistics of Games, Players, Categories and more for homepage view
    UserService
    Class that manages creation, deletion and updating of users.
    WebSocketService  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CategoryService.CategoryAlreadyExistsException
    Gets thrown when a Category is tried to be created and saved, which already exists in the database
    CategoryService.CategoryIsReferencedInCompletedGamesException
    Gets thrown when a Category is tried to be deleted, which is referenced in the persisted completed games
    StatisticsService.UserNotFoundException
    Gets thrown when a User is not found in the database
